product.name: 2K Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, WiFi Battery Powered Indoor Camera for Home Security with AI Motion Detection, Spotlight, 2-Way Talk, Siren, IP65, Cloud/SD Storage, 2 Cameras
product.description:
ZEEPORTE is committed to manufacturing reliable, high-quality security cameras that will make you enjoy peace of mind at home with continuous 24/7 protection.
Protecting every home's security is our persistent target. Your privacy is our top priority. With military-grade encryption for your video, it keeps your information secure to protect your privacy.
, providing a super clear vision even at night.
protect your property by identifying humans, vehicles, pets, which can filter 90% false alarms.
It doesn't support 5Ghz WiFi, if you have dual band wifi, first make sure choose 2.4Ghz WiFi.
Does this wireless camera support 5G Wi-Fi?
No, it doesn't support 5G Wi-Fi, it can only connect to 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi. If you are using dual-band netowrk, please make sure the camera connect to the 2.4Ghz network.
Does the outdoor security camera support 24/7 continuous recording?
No, it doesn't support 24/7 continuous recording as it is a low-power camera with requiring power-saving for a balance battery-powered working status. But it can record motion clips to when motion detected.
What should I do if the camera won't hold a charge or the battery drains quickly?
You can lower the sensitivity level to reduce false and unnecessary alarms, and set the detection period to save power.
Can the camera be powered outdoor via solar panel?
Yes, make sure the solar panel with a Type-C port cable. And the charging voltage is not less than 4.5V, 5V output.
product.bullet_points:
• Note: This wireless camera only supports 2.4GHz WiFi (Not support 5GHz WiFi). And the security camera only records motion clips, not support 24/7 recordings
• 2K QHD Resolution & Full-Color Night Vision – The outdoor wireless camera delivers stunning 2304 x 1296 resolution, offering 2K Ultra HD clarity that’s four times better than standard 1080p cameras. This provides double the detail, ensuring crisp, high-definition video and images. Equipped with a wide-angle lens and dual night vision modes: full color and infrared. It ensures high-quality footage even in low-light environments, with a maximum monitoring range of up to 33 feet.
• 100% Wireless, Rechargeable & Weatherproof – This home security camera wireless outdoor features a high-capacity rechargeable battery, providing up to 1 to 5 months of operation on a single charge. It operates wirelessly for effortless installation, with a mounting bracket and screws included, eliminating the need for complex wiring. With IP66 waterproof, the WiFi camera is highly weather-resistant and performs reliably in various harsh conditions, ensuring durability and continuous protection year-round.
• Smart PIR Motion Detection & AI Analysis – This outdoor security camera is equipped with advanced AI motion detection, capable of accurately recognizing people, vehicles, pets, and packages(requires a subscription). The AI PIR sensor triggers the outdoor camera in real-time when motion is detected, and instant notifications are sent to your phone through the app, keeping you informed immediately.
• Two-Way Audio & Voice Warning - Built-in microphone and speaker, this camera for home security allows for clear two-way conversations with visitors at your doorstep. When motion is detected, the surveillance camera activates a voice prompt and flashes a white spotlight. Also it will record motion clips in real time, sending alert message to your phone app, effectively driving away some uninvited guests.
• SD & Free 3-Day Cycle Cloud Storage - The wireless security camera outdoor has dual storage mode. SD card (up to 128G, not included), lifetime 3-day rolling cloud storage( only image message loop coverage)and 30-day free trial of advanced features that include AI recognition, upgraded cloud memory, custom alert areas and etc, the advanced features starts at $3.99 per month after 30 days trial. Also you can share live view with family to protect your home together.
